bug.author: kantuni
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h1>Summary</denchmark-h>
tensorflow has released a new version (2.3.0rc0) on June 27, 2020 which breaks test_keras_model and test_tf_keras_model pytests. I've silenced the issue by downgrading the dependency, but we need to solve it appropriately.

comments.comment: I'm pretty positive <denchmark-link:https://github.com/streamlit/streamlit/pull/1771>#1771</denchmark-link> fixes this. I did update the tests to not skip since (later versions of) Tensorflow support Python 3.8.
